name: Find 101 Doomers
description:
THE TOSK CITY HAS BEEN WAITING ONLY FOR YOU!

Join to search 101 Doomers and compete against your friends and players over the world for time! Explore the location with doomer soundtrack and try to find everyone, in this relaxing game.

FEATURES:

  • Hight resolution hand-drawn art
  • As many as 101 doomers to find
  • Doomer soundtrack
  • Achievements
  • Leaderboards
  • Dark and light themes
  • Smooth animations
  • Excellent optimization
  • Progress Saving
  • Multiple zooming capability
  • Easy 1-button control

SUBSCRIBE TO DEVELOPER'S STEAM PAGE!
